issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Sometimes the audio player starts with the following message und blocks the whole system.

{code:java}
[WARN]  e.state 4
[WARN]  e.description starting
[ERROR] Surface: getSlotFromBufferLocked: unknown buffer: 0xde7c3e70
[WARN]  W/MediaPlayer-JNI: MediaPlayer finalized without being released
[WARN]  MediaHTTPConnection: readAt 65536 / 32768 => java.net.ProtocolException: unexpected end of stream
[WARN]  JavaObject: Could not move weak reference to strong, java object has already been collected! (Key: 0)
{code}
fields.summary: Random issue "W/MediaPlayer-JNI: MediaPlayer finalized without being released" crashes App

comments.body: Hello [~benutzername], Please post on the other ticket if the solution did not work for you. We will close this ticket as a duplicate of that one. Thanks.

Hello,
We have not heard back from you since our last update.I just wanted to follow up with you about this issue? are you still experiencing this problem?
Please let us know if you need more help with this issue.

Hello,

Just passing as update here.Are you able to get that sorted out?  Please let us know if you need more help with this issue.
